channel.title: Dr. Lesa Mulligan MD - OBGYN Norman Oklahoma
channel.description: Board-certified OBGYN serving Norman, Oklahoma. Comprehensive women's healthcare including pregnancy care, gynecological services, and hormone therapy.

item.title: Welcome to Dr. Lesa Mulligan MD OBGYN
item.description: Dr. Lesa Mulligan is a board-certified OB/GYN serving Norman, Oklahoma with over 30 years of experience. Now accepting new patients at 1139 NW 36th St Suite 100, Norman, OK 73072. Call (405) 364-0643.

item.title: Services - Pregnancy Care and Gynecology
item.description: Comprehensive women's healthcare services including gynecological procedures, normal and high-risk pregnancy care, prenatal care, hormone therapy, menopause management, and more.

item.title: About Dr. Lesa Mulligan
item.description: Board certified by the American Board of Obstetrics and Gynecology. Graduate of University of Oklahoma College of Medicine. Over 30 years of experience. Only mother-daughter OBGYN partnership in Oklahoma history.
